text: كَأَن لَّمْ يَغْنَوْا۟ فِيهَآ ۗ أَلَا بُعْدًا لِّمَدْيَنَ كَمَا بَعِدَتْ ثَمُودُ

translation.en.sahih: As if they had never prospered therein. Then, away with Madyan as Thamud was taken away.
translation.id.indonesian: Seolah-olah mereka belum pernah berdiam di tempat itu. Ingatlah, kebinasaanlah bagi penduduk Mad-yan sebagaimana kaum Tsamud telah binasa.
